credit_line: Museum purchase from the Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt Fund
title: Four tiles forming square stove plate
description: Terra-cotta raised ornament on blue ground. German 18th Century style. A) has arch with heart and flowers in rayed circle. B) has arch enclosing stylized flowers and letters SF. S and D) together have cartouche with date 1756 and top inscription: "Las dich das be se n cht".
name: Four tiles forming square stove plate
